brief description: Apply with just a click of a button to have a chance of winning $50,000 to cover college expenses! No essay required!

name of scholarship: BigFuture Scholarships for the Class of 2023
brief description: Do certain tasks related to college planning
Be the applicant with the 'boldest' profile
Create an account to enter sweepstakes
Submit artwork for a postcard design, judges choose the best submission to recieve the scholarship
Sign up to enter scholarship sweepstakes, participants can increase their number of entries by completing tasks mentioned on the website
Apply with basic information, sweepstakes-based scholarship
Register to create an account with CollegeXpress to automatically be entered into their annual scholarship and access their scholarship and college resources
Sign up for a Cirkled In account and complete your student portfolio to enter, the more you add to your portfolio the better your chances of winning
Simply submit an application with your information by the deadline to be eligible to be selected as one of 150 applicants for a $20,000 scholarship
Essay based scholarship for applicants to write about "whatever they want to say to the rest of the world", must be 250 words or less

Scholarship offered to students in college or already accepted into college, requires a STEM-related essay submission, a letter of reccomendation, and a letter of acceptance from a college they plan on attending
Applicants must record a 3-5 minute audio essay and submit their audio essay along with a written copy, scholarship recipients will be judged on both the content of writing and delivery of speech
Conduct a basic "environmental stewardship" project such as recycling trash or planting trees, then submit pictures of your project and write an essay about your project
